dialogueTree.title: Encyclopedia: "The theme on that pinball machine i..."
dialogueTree.text: The theme on that pinball machine is a standard *royalist* theme -- used on everything from pinball cabinets to full-flavour cigarettes.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Clinging to a picture-book version..."
links.text: Clinging to a picture-book version of the past century, waiting for the King to come back and cast out all the profiteers and homo-sexuals. Basically, imagine a yellow plastic crown with a liquor brand emblazoned on it.

links.title: You: "Wait! Where do I get such a crown?"
links.text: Wait! Where do I get such a crown?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "It comes free with a six-pack of Ve..."
links.text: It comes free with a six-pack of Vermillon 'Roi d'Or.' The words 'ROI D'OR' are stamped into the crown's plastic.

links.title: You: "The idea of a king and a century go..."
links.text: The idea of a king and a century gone is pretty fascinating.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The sentiment is called *antecenten..."
links.text: The sentiment is called *antecentennial nostalgia* -- pining for a time before the turn of the century. It's common even now, after 50 years.

links.title: You: "I'd rather know more about the worl..."
links.text: I'd rather know more about the world of today.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The contemporary period stands stil..."
links.text: The contemporary period stands still. The fated Carousel of Progress that doomed the royalists is itself winding down. Our time is decelerating -- into what, no one knows.
